title: When is Snowdown vault-clearing sales ending?
body:
It's said that Snowdown is ending "January 6 at 2AM PST." This is only for the Game Mode correct?
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/dont-tell-poros-snowdowns-nearly-over

And the Snowdown with vault-clearing sales are "December 11 through January 6." So it's till the end of the 6th correct? http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/suit-snowdown-vault-clearing-sales

I'm asking cause I want "Silent Night Sona" but I need to buy her first (I knew she was going to on sale the 6th because why wouldn't it. -.-) via RP, but I need to know when the skin sale is going away exactly.

replies.body:
Hey WafflesTheEpic!

Your assumption is largely correct.  When we have sales that go "through" a particular date, the sale typically ends at 11:59 PM for that day.  In this case, 11:59 PM PST (For NA).

I hope this resolves some confusion! :)
I need an answer in the next 2 and half hours before I go to work, which I'll off at 2 am or so on the 6th (That's 3 am Riot server time).
